tag_narrative: Reduce inequality within and among countries
Promote peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development, provide access to justice for all and build effective, accountable and inclusive institutions at all levels
Ensure healthy lives and promote well-being for all at all ages
By 2030, empower and promote the social, economic and political inclusion of all, irrespective of age, sex, disability, race, ethnicity, origin, religion or economic or other status
Significantly reduce all forms of violence and related death rates everywhere

Achieve universal health coverage, including financial risk protection, access to quality essential health-care services and access to safe, effective, quality and affordable essential medicines and vaccines for all

Substantially increase health financing and the recruitment, development, training and retention of the health workforce in developing countries, especially in least developed countries and small island developing States
title_narrative: Italian contribution to the 2024 ICRC Special Appeal on “Disability and Mine Action” - Somalia component.
Contributo italiano all’Appello Speciale 2024 del CICR su “Disabilità e Sminamento Umanitario” - Componente Somalia
sector_narrative: Removal of land mines and explosive remnants of war
description_narrative: The initiative aims to contribute to the implementation of projects under the ICRC 2024 Special Appeal on "Disability and  Mine Action" in three different beneficiary countries, namely Afghanistan, Mali and Somalia, through specialized health care and socio-economic inclusion activities for people with disabilities, especially victims of landmines and other unexploded ordnance.

L’iniziativa intende contribuire alla realizzazione dei progetti previsti nell’ambito dell’Appello Speciale 2024 del CICR su “Disabilità e Sminamento Umanitario” in tre diversi Paesi beneficiari, ovvero Afghanistan, Mali e Somalia, mediante attività di assistenza sanitaria specialistica e di inclusione socio-economica dei disabili, in particolar modo vittime di mine anti-persona ed altri ordigni bellici inesplosi.
